EmailTemplate.subject: Have You Heard About Sophia?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-startup-by-sophia.aspx?cmp=EBBSOCTOBERBLOG1928EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+BS+Explicit+&utm_content=Disengaged+Stream]]> A Different Kind of Small Business! <[[http://www.example.com]]> Meet one of our littlest entrepreneurs Sophia Fairweather. At only 11 years old, this young scientist sells her inventions through her online business, Start Up By Sophia. Supporting her on her path to success is Grand & Toy – always there for her with the products she needs. LEARN MORE <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-startup-by-sophia.aspx?cmp=EBBSOCTOBERBLOG1928EN&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Disengaged+Nurture+BS+Explicit+&utm_content=Disengaged+Stream]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
